attributes.action: Grant Radio Caroline To Broadcast On DAB Radio, Nationally.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Radio Caroline is what is good in radio, the one and only reason that the goverment do not want to grant a licence is that if they do, radio 1 ect... are finished and they known it.
Come PM you used to listen like me when you were a kid.
